content.content:
Sohyun!!

I'm so glad that you comeback to your activities, i missed you so much from this part of the world, Chile South America.

First, i would like to wish you a happy birthday, i hope you receive lot of loves and to be a day full of happiness.

I would love if you can come to Chile, South America one day.

We talked on the last fancall of Visionary Vision and you really wrote a really beautiful message to me, that i will never forget.

Please keep always smiling and being happy!

And lastly, this is more like a personal request, but please dont stop recommending songs and books, i will always listen and read them.

Greetings,

Cristian
WAV from Chile
